name: product-management-demo-backend
description: Back End for a product management demo

scripts.pretest: echo 'Booting Database' && sudo docker-compose -f test-db.yaml --profile test up -d -V
scripts.test: npm run clearlogs && npx tsx --test --test-concurrency=1 || true
scripts.posttest: echo 'Closing Database' && sudo docker-compose -f test-db.yaml down --volumes
scripts.prestart: echo 'Booting Database' && sudo docker-compose -f test-db.yaml --profile test up -d -V
